statements: SELECT * FROM water_usage_tracking WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT date, water_usage FROM water_usage_tracking WHERE user_id = 54321 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location FROM water_usage_tracking WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY water_usage ASC;
SELECT user_id, location FROM water_usage_tracking WHERE leak_identified = TRUE AND water_usage > 50;
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM water_usage_tracking;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_tracking WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT user_id, location FROM water_usage_tracking WHERE location = 'Kitchen' AND leak_identified = True
SELECT user_id, water_usage FROM water_usage_tracking WHERE location = 'Bathroom' AND leak_identified = False ORDER BY water_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM water_usage_tracking WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND location LIKE '%Outdoor%'
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS avg_water_usage FROM water_usage_tracking WHERE leak_identified = False
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, date, usage_volume FROM WaterUsage WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, time, usage_volume FROM WaterUsage ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT id, date, leak_status FROM LeakDetection WHERE volume_leaked > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LeakDetection WHERE leak_status = true;
SELECT id, date, time, usage_volume FROM WaterUsage WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, time, usage_volume FROM WaterUsage WHERE usage_volume > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE id = 5;
SELECT sensor_id, date, time FROM LeakDetection WHERE leak_status = TRUE ORDER BY date ASC, time ASC;
SELECT AVG(usage_volume) AS avg_volume FROM WaterUsage;
SELECT * FROM User;
SELECT username, email FROM User ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, address FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WaterUsage WHERE usage_amount > 100;

SELECT User.username, WaterUsage.usage_date, LeakDetection.detection_method FROM User INNER JOIN WaterUsage ON User.user_id = WaterUsage.user_id INNER JOIN LeakDetection ON WaterUsage.usage_id = LeakDetection.usage_id;
SELECT * FROM User WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM User WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT u.username, w.usage_date, l.detection_method FROM User u JOIN WaterUsage w ON u.user_id = w.user_id JOIN LeakDetection l ON w.usage_id = l.usage_id WHERE l.detection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT u.username, w.usage_amount FROM WaterUsage w JOIN User u ON w.user_id = u.user_id WHERE w.usage_date >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT DISTINCT u.username FROM User u JOIN WaterUsage w ON u.user_id = w.user_id WHERE w.usage_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption;
SELECT user_id, consumption_amount FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(consumption_amount) AS max_consumption FROM WaterConsumption;
SELECT * FROM WaterLeakDetection WHERE leak_status = TRUE;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, pattern_type FROM WaterConsumptionPatterns WHERE pattern_type = 'daily';
SELECT user_id, consumption_amount, consumption_date FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM WaterLeakDetection WHERE leak_status = TRUE AND leak_location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY detection_date ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM WaterConsumptionPatterns WHERE pattern_type = 'Regular' AND pattern_description LIKE '%saving%' ORDER BY pattern_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, conservation_type FROM WaterConservationEvents WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption, AVG(consumption_amount) AS avg_consumption FROM WaterConsumption;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, consumption_volume FROM WaterConsumption WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT name, email FROM UserInformation WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM LeakDetection WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY date_detected ASC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM WaterSources;
SELECT name, email FROM UserInformation WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT source_name, location FROM WaterSources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT SUM(consumption_volume) AS total_consumption FROM WaterConsumption WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM LeakDetection WHERE type = 'pipe' AND severity = 'high';
SELECT user_id, MAX(date_detected) AS latest_detection_date FROM LeakDetection GROUP BY user_id;
